etomica.data.meter

Class MeterProfileByVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.meter.MeterProfileByVolume
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeterProfileByVolumeAdsorption

    public class MeterProfileByVolume
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource, DataSourceIndependent, java.io.Serializable
    Meter that takes a (scalar) Meter and records its property as a 1-dimensional function of position in the simulation volume. The measured property must be a quantity that can be associated with a single molecule. The position coordinate lies along one dimension (x,y,z). Data is averaged as sum(values)/dV where dV is the volume of the bin. As such, this meter is measuring the "density" of the quantity returned by the atomic meter.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int getProfileDim()
        Accessor method for vector describing the direction along which the profile is measured. Each atom position is dotted along this vector to obtain its profile abscissa value.

      • setProfileDim

        public void setProfileDim(int dim)
        Accessor method for vector describing the direction along which the profile is measured. Each atom position is dotted along this vector to obtain its profile abscissa value. The given vector is converted to a unit vector, if not already.
